review: The only thing that could make this better would be for ESPN to offer their service for a monthly fee like Hulu or Netflix.  Then I could truly ditch cable!!!!  Also, the voice remote would've been nice as standard equipment.
author: Timothy Daniel

review: Its nice to access all of your netflix, hulu, and other streaming apps but the games are troublesome first I bought my daughter the 10 dollar disney game and it would go to the intro and stop working then she was playing crossy road and the screen keeps going a blank color in the background. I love Amazon and truly think they are an amazing company who betters my everyday life. I order something from amazon every other day. I love same day shipping! I even planned on my daughter doing her gaming on the amazon fire stick as oppose to her other gaming systems but this has been a flop for gaming. :( I really expected more! Keep at it amazon! I really want to see this function smoothly games and all. Maybe the one I have is a bust? but I just bought it 2 days ago and I am already disappointed.
author: Ashley

review: We love the Fire TV Stick.  In fact we love it so much we purchased a second to leave at our second home (so we don't forget to take it) and just purchased as a gift for our Son.  You can't beat the price and the selection as a Prime member is super.
